H2.text: who want to be a millionaire calls his dad. Entrepreneur

H3.text: who want to be a millionaire calls his dad. Carpenter

A4.text: Almost 75% of male entrepreneurs start a firm in an industry in the same or related industry as that of their father. Such ventures tend to be more successful, as the sons obtain industry knowledge through informal interactions with their fathers.
